revised_title: A Study of Floral Anatomy and Development in Plants
tldr: The authors investigate the anatomy and development of flowers, focusing on the vascular cords and their role in the formation of floral parts. They explain how the union, separation, and fusion of cords affect the arrangement of floral organs and provide insights into the phenomena of cohesion and adhesion in plants. The study also clarifies the structure of axile and free central placentations in flowers.
